userreviews.userReview: Fun Read I am enjoying this series. It's an easy read that keeps you entertained. You want to know what's going to happen next. I have read each book in a day, because I didn't want to put it down. Life doesn't let that happen. I enjoy the fact that it's not just another slasher/porn story. Honestly, the way this book ended kind of pissed me off. It's absolutely worth the read. Now book 3.
A TALE OF SOME WEIRD SCARY STUFF IT IS...Hello, the story seems to be picking up a little steam. We still don't know a whole lot, but a few tidbits can be found. I liked this one. Thanks.

description: The world beheld the Rapture. The plague on humanity continues. 1.3 million American adults are now ravenous killers. 35 million infected children now hunger for flesh. Shane Nettleton and his band of survivors must continue their struggle trapped on a tug boat adrift in the Gulf of Mexico. "But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter, neither on the sabbath day: For then shall be great tribulation, such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time, no, nor ever shall be. And except those days should be shortened, there should no flesh be saved..." - Mathew 13: 20-22
title: The Apocalypse of Enoch - Scourge
